page.title: 19St.Johns Church
page.content: There is a plaque to Edward Edward who died in 1836 after fighting in the Alamo.There is also a man from Aberaman believed to be a dwarf who was buried standing up in the walls of St.Johns so that everybody would have to look up at him.Also somebody was buried in a leaded coffin so that the stench from his body wouldn't enter the church. In 1795 the first circulating school with 60 pupils was started in the church.Inside the church there is the priest's door from 1740 and also a piscina for the priest to wash his hands before the communion.The stained glass window on the west wall was made by John Pitts also the Westminster architects have been to the church.
